subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro won his 18th consecutive match and a spot in the Legg Mason Tennis Classic final in Washington with a 6-2, 6-1 victory over Tommy Haas. He will face Viktor Troicki, who defeated Igor Kunitsyn in the other semifinal, 6-4, 6-2.
snippet: Juan Martin del Potro won his 18th consecutive match and a spot in the Legg Mason Tennis Classic final in Washington with a 6-2, 6-1 victory over Tommy Haas. He will face Viktor Troicki, who defeated Igor Kunitsyn in the other semifinal, 6-4, 6-2.
